name: ROOM018BCN
description: ROOM018BCN is a new, modern and friendly hostel, located a few meters from SANTS Train Station and the iconic NOU CAMP (Barcelona Football Club).Its location is ideal to enjoy a unique experience of Barcelona. Perfectly connected to the city center, the beach, bus stations, train (Sants) and Barcelona airport, ROOM018BCN is 3 minutes away from two metro stops (Les Corts and Plaça del Centre) as well as many bus stops to take you to the city center in less than 10 min as well as other monuments and neighborhoods of Barcelona that you cannot miss. And after a long day of sightseeing and emotions, the quiet environment where ROOM018BCN is located will provide you with the perfect rest you deserve.All ROOM018BCN staff wants you to feel as at home, offering spaces for you to socialize, to share stories and experiences with us and the other customers. Do not hesitate to consult or ask our staff for whatever you would need.We also offer bike rental so that you can explore the city in a different way, do not hesitate to ask our staff for the plan with the location of the points of interest and Barcelona's most emblematic monuments. Our location right in front of the bike lane network, will take you to the Diagonal Avenue in less than 3 minutes.We also offer a fully equipped office so you can prepare your meals, opposite to ROOM018BCN there’s a large supermarket where you'll find everything you need.To make your stay more enjoyable, we have various games, a lounge with TV and Play Station, a projector that will show different images of monuments and curious places to visit in our city, a space for books exchange, etc….OUR ROOMSAll our hostel rooms are modern, spacious and bright. They have individual lockers, individual reading light and plug in bed, sheets and duvet included and you can rent towels if needed.We offer a wide range of rooms for you to find what you are looking for: MIXED ROOM 2, 4, 6 or 8 BEDS , perfect for complete book if you're a couple, a family or a small group of friends, or ideal if you want to share with other travelers.FEMALE ROOM 2, 4 or 6 BEDS, if you'd like to share it only with girls.ROOMS ADAPTED FOR DISABLED PEOPLE that have more room to maneuver. ROOM018BCN has bath and shower fully adapted and accessible.DOUBLE & TRIPLE ROOM WITH PRIVATE BATH if you prefer to share common areas but want to rest in your room with private bathroom, we also offer you this.SERVICES24h receptionVideo surveillance system 24hBreakfastFully equipped community kitchenTowels HireDaily cleaning of roomsSecure lockers prepared for padlockPadlocks rentalFree Wi- Fi throughout the HostelComputers available for the customersSelf- service laundry room with washer + dryer + ironSelf-service beverage and snacksPlay Station and gamesBicycle RentalsDirected activities inside and outside the hostelAir conditioning / heating throughout.Hostel accessible for people with reduced mobility.Tours.Children complements available to customers (cot, high chair, baby- cook, etc. . )Tourism InformationParking in Basement
